Container.Name: Plex
Container.Overview: Plex organizes video, music and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart TVs, streaming boxes and mobile devices.[br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Nvidia GPU Use[/span][/u][/b][br]Using the Unraid Nvidia Plugin to install a version of Unraid with the Nvidia Drivers installed and[br] add [b]--runtime=nvidia[/b] to [b]"extra parameters"[/b] (switch on advanced view) and[br]copy your [b]GPU UUID[/b] to [b]NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.[/b][br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Intel GPU Use[/span][/u][/b][br]Edit your [b]go[/b] file to include:[br][b]modprobe i915[br][/b], save and reboot, then [br]add [b]--device=/dev/dri[/b] to [b]"extra parameters"[/b] (switch on advanced view)
